00023 #pragma once
00024 
00025 #include <l4/sys/utcb.h>
00026 #include <l4/sys/ipc-invoke.h>
00027 
00028 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00029 l4_usem_down_to(l4_cap_idx_t ksem, l4_u_semaphore_t *sem, l4_timeout_s timeout) L4_NOTHROW
00030 {
00031   l4_msgtag_t res;
00032 
00033   l4_utcb_mr()->mr[0] = (l4_addr_t)sem;
00034 
00035   do
00036     {
00037       unsigned long dummy1, dummy2, dummy3;
00038       __asm__ __volatile__(
00039        "   xorl %%eax, %%eax  \n\t"
00040        "   decl 0(%%edi)  \n\t"
00041        "   jge  1f    \n\t"
00042        "   mov $1, %%eax  \n\t"
00043        L4_ENTER_KERNEL
00044        "1:      \n\t"
00045        :
00046        "=D" (dummy1),
00047        "=c" (dummy2),
00048        "=d" (dummy3),
00049        "=a" (res.raw)
00050        :
00051        "D" (sem),
00052        "d" (ksem),
00053        "c" (timeout)
00054        :
00055        "esi", "memory" L4S_PIC_CLOBBER
00056       );
00057     }
00058   while (l4_msgtag_label(res) == L4_USEM_RETRY);
00059 
00060   return res;
00061 }
00062 
00063 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00064 l4_usem_up(l4_cap_idx_t ksem, l4_u_semaphore_t *sem) L4_NOTHROW
00065 {
00066   l4_msgtag_t tag;
00067   l4_utcb_mr()->mr[0] = (l4_addr_t)sem;
00068   __asm__ __volatile__(
00069   "xorl %%eax, %%eax      \n\t"
00070   "incl 0(%%edi)    \n\t"
00071   "testb $1, 4(%%edi) \n\t"
00072   "jz   2f    \n\t"
00073   "mov $0x10001, %%eax  \n\t"
00074   L4_ENTER_KERNEL
00075   "2:     \n\t"
00076        :
00077   "=D" (sem),
00078   "=d" (ksem),
00079   "=a" (tag.raw)
00080        :
00081   "D" (sem),
00082   "d" (ksem)
00083        :
00084   "ecx", "esi", "memory" L4S_PIC_CLOBBER
00085        );
00086 
00087   return tag;
00088 }
